recipes.label: Ward off an Influence
recipes.startdescription: There is an oppressive presence here, or an outside intention effecting me and mine. I can use declining Winter or the vivaceous Heart.
recipes.description: There is an oppressive presence here, or an outside intention effecting me and mine. I can use declining Winter or the vivaceous Heart.

recipes.label: A Syncopation Of The Soul
recipes.startdescription: My being is music, my body is joy. Within the rhythms of my life there is no space for opposition.

recipes.label: A Counter-Charm
recipes.startdescription: My heart is a drum, and it drowns out the whatever is attempts to take hold of me. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: An Interruptive Beat
recipes.startdescription: My snapping fingers can't be stilled. My swaying steps shake what clings to me. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: The Inclination Towards The End
recipes.startdescription: Inexorably, all things follow the course of the Sun. By my authority, now is the time for a final ending. We wil almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Dwindling Light
recipes.startdescription: Under my setting-sun gaze, stains wither until only barren beauty remains. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Fading Light
recipes.startdescription: Compared to the solumnity that has settled in my soul, all other things fade to grey. We may yet succeed.
